content: **crocheted star / christmas decoration in drops muskat and drops brushed alpaca silk worked in the round from the middle and outwards theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #milkywaygarland drops design pattern r-844 yarn group b + c or d ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx 9 cm in diameter from star tip to star tip **yarn** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 08 off white and use drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 25 g colour 01 off white 1 star weighs approx 4 g **accessories** optional string or left-over yarn to hang **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge ** 16 treble crochets in width and 9 5 row vertically with 2 strands on hook size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
